content: crochet this cozy bellame baby blanket to welcome your new arrival this blanket is designed to be an heirloom piece that will be loved and used for years to come if you re looking for a fun textured blanket to hold your interest as you crochet this is the perfect project for you it is made using the single_crochet half_double_crochet and crossed half_double_crochet stitches to create tons of texture > buy 2 patterns get 1 free with coupon code freepattern add all 3 patterns to your cart and use the coupon code discount will be applied at checkout > **pattern bundle - 4 textured crochet blanket patterns including this one for $10 https //www ravelry com/redeem/this-pixie-creates sale=345532** * this is a beginner friendly pattern that uses three stitches single_crochet half_double_crochet and crossed half_double_crochet * this blanket is worked length-wise meaning that your starting chain is the length of your blanket this will never change and as you crochet each row your blanket becomes wider therefore make sure that you are happy with the length of your chain before you begin * the pattern is intended to make a baby blanket but instructions are provided to adjust the length and width of your blanket so you can customize it to suit your needs > **video tutorial crossed half_double_crochet stitch https //www youtube com/watch v=yknoc8flzhs** >find the free version of the bellame baby blanket here 1 **the printable pdf is a total of 8 pages including the cover page a colour chart and step-by-step pictures to help you along the way ** 1 https //thispixiecreates com/how-to-crochet-the-bellame-baby-blanket/
